name: Adamant Shield
loreDescription: That damn shield can't be penetrated by anything. I guarantee you, cause even my sword couldn't.

skillDescription.base: Decreases critical hit damage received by all allies by 8.0%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.
skillDescription.max: Decreases critical hit damage received by all allies by 16.0%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.
